publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1153# Bruce Crawford: Gulf War Related Illnesses-That the Parliament notes the continuing concern being expressed by veterans of the Gulf War that multiple vaccines given to Gulf War troops, oil-fire related pollution, depleted uranium used in shells and possible pollution from destroyed Iraqi chemical and biological weapon sites may be responsible for the illnesses known as Gulf War related illnesses; further notes the evidence from the British Medical Journal and research undertaken by the Gulf War Research Unit at Kings College, London to this effect, and asks the Scottish Executive to ensure that each NHS health board, Trust and local authority is provided with appropriate advice and guidance recognising the existence of the "related illnesses" and instructing them to ensure that proper and adequate resources are allocated to improving the quality of life for those Gulf War veterans who are affected by Gulf War related illnesses.

S1M-1153# Bruce Crawford: Gulf War Related Illnesses-That the Parliament notes the continuing concern being expressed by veterans of the Gulf War that multiple vaccines given to Gulf War troops, oil-fire related pollution, depleted uranium used in shells and possible pollution from destroyed Iraqi chemical and biological weapon sites may be responsible for the illnesses known as Gulf War related illnesses; further notes the evidence from the British Medical Journal and research undertaken by the Gulf War Research Unit at Kings College, London to this effect, and asks the Scottish Executive to ensure that each NHS health board, Trust and local authority is provided with appropriate advice and guidance recognising the existence of the "related illnesses" and instructing them to ensure that proper and adequate resources are allocated to improving the quality of life for those Gulf War veterans who are affected by Gulf War related illnesses. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Fiona McLeod*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fergus Ewing*, Bruce Crawford*
S1M-1153# Gulf War Related Illnesses (lodged on 7 September 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Donald Gorrie*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-1153# Gulf War Related Illnesses (lodged on 7 September 2000) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Christine Grahame*, Brian Adam*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Colin Campbell*, Michael Russell*
S1M-1153# Gulf War Related Illnesses (lodged on 7 September 2000) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Robert Brown*, Linda Fabiani*
